dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 02, 2005 1:18 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; cbc@mbbp.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright infringement
Date: Mon, 1 Aug 2005 18:00:36 -0400
From: Chris Carmody <cbc@mbbp.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Please see the attached letter concerning copyright infringement being
engaged in on a website that you host.



Christopher Carmody, Paralegal

Morse, Barnes-Brown & Pendleton, P.C.
Reservoir Place

 1601 Trapelo Road
Waltham, MA 02451
PH: (781) 622-5930  // Fax: (781) 622-5933

E-Mail: cbc@mbbp.com
Website: www.mbbp.com <http://www.mbbp.com/> Business | Securities | M&A |
Technology + IP | Tax | Employment + Immigration

To ensure compliance with U.S. Treasury Regulations governing tax practice,
we inform you that any U.S. tax advice contained in this communication
(including any attachments) is not intended or written to be used, and
cannot be used, for the purpose of
(i) avoiding penalties under the Internal Revenue Code or
(ii) promoting, marketing or recommending to another party any transaction
or matter addressed herein.

This message (including any attachments) may be a confidential and
privileged communication to the intended addressee.
If you are not the intended addressee, you have received this message in
error.
In that case, please permanently delete this message and call us at
781-622-5930 so that we can avoid this inconvenience in the future.
Thank you.





--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
dmca.principal_name: Morse, Barnes-Brown & Pendleton, P.C. (For Kaspersky Lab, Inc.)
